013package org.apache.juneau.bean.openapi3;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ConverterUtils.*;
018
019import java.util.*;
020
021import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
024
025/**
026 * Allows the definition of input and output data types.
027 *
028 * <p>
029 * The Schema Object allows the definition of input and output data types, including objects, primitives, and arrays.
030 * This object is an extended subset of the JSON Schema Specification Draft 4, with additional extensions provided
031 * by the OpenAPI Specification to allow for more complete documentation.
032 *
033 * <h5 class='section'>OpenAPI Specification:</h5>
034 * <p>
035 * The Schema Object supports all properties from JSON Schema Draft 4, including but not limited to:
036 * <ul class='spaced-list'>
037 *    <li><c>type</c> (string) - The data type. Values: <js>"string"</js>, <js>"number"</js>, <js>"integer"</js>, <js>"boolean"</js>, <js>"array"</js>, <js>"object"</js>
038 *    <li><c>format</c> (string) - The format modifier (e.g., <js>"int32"</js>, <js>"int64"</js>, <js>"float"</js>, <js>"double"</js>, <js>"date"</js>, <js>"date-time"</js>)
039 *    <li><c>title</c> (string) - A short title for the schema
040 *    <li><c>description</c> (string) - A description of the schema (CommonMark syntax may be used)
041 *    <li><c>default</c> (any) - The default value
042 *    <li><c>multipleOf</c> (number) - Must be a multiple of this value
043 *    <li><c>maximum</c> (number) - Maximum value (inclusive by default)
044 *    <li><c>exclusiveMaximum</c> (boolean) - If true, maximum is exclusive
045 *    <li><c>minimum</c> (number) - Minimum value (inclusive by default)
046 *    <li><c>exclusiveMinimum</c> (boolean) - If true, minimum is exclusive
047 *    <li><c>maxLength</c> (integer) - Maximum string length
048 *    <li><c>minLength</c> (integer) - Minimum string length
049 *    <li><c>pattern</c> (string) - Regular expression pattern the string must match
050 *    <li><c>maxItems</c> (integer) - Maximum array length
051 *    <li><c>minItems</c> (integer) - Minimum array length
052 *    <li><c>uniqueItems</c> (boolean) - If true, array items must be unique
053 *    <li><c>maxProperties</c> (integer) - Maximum number of object properties
054 *    <li><c>minProperties</c> (integer) - Minimum number of object properties
055 *    <li><c>required</c> (array of string) - Required property names
056 *    <li><c>enum</c> (array) - Possible values for this schema
057 *    <li><c>properties</c> (map of {@link SchemaInfo}) - Object property definitions
058 *    <li><c>items</c> ({@link Items}) - Schema for array items
059 *    <li><c>allOf</c> (array of {@link SchemaInfo}) - Must validate against all schemas
060 *    <li><c>oneOf</c> (array of {@link SchemaInfo}) - Must validate against exactly one schema
061 *    <li><c>anyOf</c> (array of {@link SchemaInfo}) - Must validate against any schema
062 *    <li><c>not</c> ({@link SchemaInfo}) - Must not validate against this schema
063 *    <li><c>nullable</c> (boolean) - Allows the value to be null (OpenAPI 3.0 extension)
064 *    <li><c>discriminator</c> ({@link Discriminator}) - Discriminator for polymorphism (OpenAPI extension)
065 *    <li><c>readOnly</c> (boolean) - Relevant only for Schema properties (OpenAPI extension)
066 *    <li><c>writeOnly</c> (boolean) - Relevant only for Schema properties (OpenAPI extension)
067 *    <li><c>xml</c> ({@link Xml}) - XML representation details (OpenAPI extension)
068 *    <li><c>externalDocs</c> ({@link ExternalDocumentation}) - Additional external documentation (OpenAPI extension)
069 *    <li><c>example</c> (any) - Example value (OpenAPI extension)
070 *    <li><c>deprecated</c> (boolean) - Specifies that the schema is deprecated (OpenAPI extension)
071 * </ul>
072 *
073 * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
074 * <p class='bjava'>
075 *    <jc>// Create a schema for a Pet object</jc>
076 *    SchemaInfo <jv>schema</jv> = <jk>new</jk> SchemaInfo()
077 *       .setType(<js>"object"</js>)
078 *       .setRequired(<js>"id"</js>, <js>"name"</js>)
079 *       .setProperties(
080 *          JsonMap.<jsm>of</jsm>(
081 *             <js>"id"</js>, <jk>new</jk> SchemaInfo().setType(<js>"integer"</js>).setFormat(<js>"int64"</js>),
082 *             <js>"name"</js>, <jk>new</jk> SchemaInfo().setType(<js>"string"</js>),
083 *             <js>"tag"</js>, <jk>new</jk> SchemaInfo().setType(<js>"string"</js>)
084 *          )
085 *       );
086 * </p>
087 *
088 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
089 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://spec.openapis.org/oas/v3.0.0#schema-object">OpenAPI Specification &gt; Schema Object</a>
090 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/docs/specification/data-models/">OpenAPI Data Models</a>
091 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://json-schema.org/">JSON Schema Specification</a>
092 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanOpenApi3">juneau-bean-openapi3</a>
093 * </ul>
094 */
095@FluentSetters
096public class SchemaInfo extends OpenApiElement {
097
098   private String
099      format,
100      title,
101      description,
102      pattern,
103      ref,
104      type;
105   private Number
106      multipleOf,
107      maximum,
108      minimum;
109   private Integer
110      maxLength,
111      minLength,
112      maxItems,
113      minItems,
114      maxProperties,
115      minProperties;
116   private Boolean
117      exclusiveMaximum,
118      exclusiveMinimum,
119      uniqueItems,
120      nullable,
121      writeOnly,
122      readOnly,
123      deprecated;
124   private Object
125      _default,  // NOSONAR - Intentional naming.
126      example;
127   private Items items;
128   private Xml xml;
129   private ExternalDocumentation externalDocs;
130   private List<Object>
131         allOf,
132         oneOf,
133         anyOf,
134         _enum;  // NOSONAR - Intentional naming.
135   private List<String>
136      required;
137   private Discriminator discriminator;
138   private Map<String, SchemaInfo> properties;
139   private SchemaInfo additionalProperties;
140   private SchemaInfo not;
141
142   /**
143    * Default constructor.
144    */
145   public SchemaInfo() {}
146
147   /**
148    * Copy constructor.
149    *
150    * @param copyFrom The object to copy.
151    */
152   public SchemaInfo(SchemaInfo copyFrom) {
153      super(copyFrom);
154
155      this.format = copyFrom.format;
156      this.title = copyFrom.title;
157      this.description = copyFrom.description;
158      this.ref = copyFrom.ref;
159      this.nullable = copyFrom.nullable;
160      this.writeOnly = copyFrom.writeOnly;
161      this.deprecated = copyFrom.deprecated;
162      this.pattern = copyFrom.pattern;
163      this.type = copyFrom.type;
164      this.discriminator = copyFrom.discriminator;
165      this.multipleOf = copyFrom.multipleOf;
166      this.maximum = copyFrom.maximum;
167      this.minimum = copyFrom.minimum;
168      this.maxLength = copyFrom.maxLength;
169      this.minLength = copyFrom.minLength;
170      this.maxItems = copyFrom.maxItems;
171      this.minItems = copyFrom.minItems;
172      this.maxProperties = copyFrom.maxProperties;
173      this.minProperties = copyFrom.minProperties;
174      this.exclusiveMaximum = copyFrom.exclusiveMaximum;
175      this.exclusiveMinimum = copyFrom.exclusiveMinimum;
176      this.uniqueItems = copyFrom.uniqueItems;
177      this.readOnly = copyFrom.readOnly;
178      this._default = copyFrom._default;
179      this.example = copyFrom.example;
180      this.items = copyFrom.items == null ? null : copyFrom.items.copy();
181      this.xml = copyFrom.xml == null ? null : copyFrom.xml.copy();
182      this.externalDocs = copyFrom.externalDocs == null ? null : copyFrom.externalDocs.copy();
183      this._enum = copyOf(copyFrom._enum);
184      this.allOf = copyOf(copyFrom.allOf);
185      this.required = copyOf(copyFrom.required);
186      this.anyOf = copyOf(copyFrom.anyOf);
187      this.oneOf = copyOf(copyFrom.oneOf);
188      this.properties = copyOf(copyFrom.properties, SchemaInfo::copy);
189      this.additionalProperties = copyFrom.additionalProperties == null ? null : copyFrom.additionalProperties.copy();
190      this.not = copyFrom.not == null ? null : copyFrom.not.copy();
191   }
192
193   /**
194    * Make a deep copy of this object.
195    *
196    * @return A deep copy of this object.
197    */
198   public SchemaInfo copy() {
199      return new SchemaInfo(this);
200   }
201
202   /**
203    * Bean property getter:  <property>format</property>.
204    *
205    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
206    */
207   public String getFormat() {
208      return format;
209   }
210
211   /**
212    * Bean property setter:  <property>format</property>.
213    *
214    * @param value
215    *    The new value for this property.
216    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
217    *    <br>Formats defined by the OAS include:
218    *    <ul>
219    *       <li><js>"int32"</js>
220    *       <li><js>"int64"</js>
221    *       <li><js>"float"</js>
222    *       <li><js>"double"</js>
223    *       <li><js>"byte"</js>
224    *       <li><js>"binary"</js>
225    *       <li><js>"date"</js>
226    *       <li><js>"date-time"</js>
227    *       <li><js>"password"</js>
228    *    </ul>
229    * @return This object
230    */
231   public SchemaInfo setFormat(String value) {
232      format = value;
233      return this;
234   }

288   public Object getDefault() {
289      return _default;
290   }

617   /**
618    * Bean property getter:  <property>required</property>.
619    *
620    * <p>
621    * The list of required properties.
622    *
623    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
624    */
625   public List<String> getRequired() {
626      return required;
627   }
628
629   /**
630    * Bean property setter:  <property>required</property>.
631    *
632    * <p>
633    * The list of required properties.
634    *
635    * @param value
636    *    The new value for this property.
637    *    <br>Valid values:
638    *    <ul>
639    *       <li><js>"http"</js>
640    *       <li><js>"https"</js>
641    *       <li><js>"ws"</js>
642    *       <li><js>"wss"</js>
643    *    </ul>
644    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
645    * @return This object
646    */
647   public SchemaInfo setRequired(Collection<String> value) {
648      required = listFrom(value);
649      return this;
650   }
651
652   /**
653    * Same as {@link #addRequired(String...)}.
654    *
655    * @param values
656    *    The new value for this property.
657    *    <br>Valid types:
658    *    <ul>
659    *       <li><code>Collection&lt;String&gt;</code>
660    *       <li><code>String</code> - JSON array representation of <code>Collection&lt;String&gt;</code>
661    *          <h5 class='figure'>Example:</h5>
662    *          <p class='bcode'>
663    *    schemes(<js>"['scheme1','scheme2']"</js>);
664    *          </p>
665    *       <li><code>String</code> - Individual values
666    *          <h5 class='figure'>Example:</h5>
667    *          <p class='bcode'>
668    *    schemes(<js>"scheme1</js>, <js>"scheme2"</js>);
669    *          </p>
670    *    </ul>
671    * @return This object
672    */
673   public SchemaInfo addRequired(String...values) {
674      required = listBuilder(String.class).sparse().add(values).build();
675      return this;
676   }
677

679    * Bean property getter:  <property>enum</property>.
680    *
681    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
682    */
683   public List<Object> getEnum() {
684      return _enum;
685   }
686
687   /**
688    * Bean property setter:  <property>enum</property>.
689    *
690    * @param value
691    *    The new value for this property.
692    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
693    * @return This object
694    */
695   public SchemaInfo setEnum(Collection<Object> value) {
696      _enum = listFrom(value);
697      return this;
698   }
699
700   /**
701    * Adds one or more values to the <property>enum</property> property.

704    *    The values to add to this property.

706    *    <ul>

710    *          <h5 class='figure'>Example:</h5>
711    *          <p class='bcode'>
712    *    _enum(<js>"['foo','bar']"</js>);

716    *          <p class='bcode'>
717    *    _enum(<js>"foo"</js>, <js>"bar"</js>);
718    *          </p>
719    *    </ul>
720    *    <br>Ignored if <jk>null</jk>.
721    * @return This object
722    */
723   public SchemaInfo addEnum(Object...values) {
724      setEnum(setBuilder(Object.class).sparse().addAny(values).build());
725      return this;

1180   @Override /* SwaggerElement */
1181   public <T> T get(String property, Class<T> type) {
1182      assertArgNotNull("property", property);
1183      return switch (property) {  // NOSONAR
1184         case "format" -> toType(getFormat(), type);
1185         case "title" -> toType(getTitle(), type);
1186         case "description" -> toType(getDescription(), type);
1187         case "default" -> toType(getDefault(), type);
1188         case "multipleOf" -> toType(getMultipleOf(), type);
1189         case "maximum" -> toType(getMaximum(), type);
1190         case "exclusiveMaximum" -> toType(getExclusiveMaximum(), type);
1191         case "minimum" -> toType(getMinimum(), type);
1192         case "exclusiveMinimum" -> toType(getExclusiveMinimum(), type);
1193         case "maxLength" -> toType(getMaxLength(), type);
1194         case "minLength" -> toType(getMinLength(), type);
1195         case "pattern" -> toType(getPattern(), type);
1196         case "maxItems" -> toType(getMaxItems(), type);
1197         case "minItems" -> toType(getMinItems(), type);
1198         case "uniqueItems" -> toType(getUniqueItems(), type);
1199         case "maxProperties" -> toType(getMaxProperties(), type);
1200         case "minProperties" -> toType(getMinProperties(), type);
1201         case "required" -> toType(getRequired(), type);
1202         case "enum" -> toType(getEnum(), type);
1203         case "type" -> toType(getType(), type);
1204         case "items" -> toType(getItems(), type);
1205         case "allOf" -> toType(getAllOf(), type);
1206         case "oneOf" -> toType(getOneOf(), type);
1207         case "anyOf" -> toType(getAnyOf(), type);
1208         case "properties" -> toType(getProperties(), type);
1209         case "additionalProperties" -> toType(getAdditionalProperties(), type);
1210         case "not" -> toType(getNot(), type);
1211         case "nullable" -> toType(getNullable(), type);
1212         case "deprecated" -> toType(getDeprecated(), type);
1213         case "discriminator" -> toType(getDiscriminator(), type);
1214         case "readOnly" -> toType(getReadOnly(), type);
1215         case "writeOnly" -> toType(getWriteOnly(), type);
1216         case "xml" -> toType(getXml(), type);
1217         case "externalDocs" -> toType(getExternalDocs(), type);
1218         case "example" -> toType(getExample(), type);
1219         case "$ref" -> toType(getRef(), type);
1220         default -> super.get(property, type);
1221      };
1222   }
1223
1224   @Override /* SwaggerElement */
1225   public SchemaInfo set(String property, Object value) {
1226      assertArgNotNull("property", property);
1227      return switch (property) {  // NOSONAR
1228         case "$ref" -> setRef(value);
1229         case "additionalProperties" -> setAdditionalProperties(toType(value, SchemaInfo.class));
1230         case "allOf" -> setAllOf(listBuilder(Object.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
1231         case "anyOf" -> setAnyOf(listBuilder(Object.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
1232         case "default" -> setDefault(value);
1233         case "deprecated" -> setDeprecated(toBoolean(value));
1234         case "description" -> setDescription(Utils.s(value));
1235         case "discriminator" -> setDiscriminator(toType(value, Discriminator.class));
1236         case "enum" -> setEnum(listBuilder(Object.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
1237         case "example" -> setExample(value);
1238         case "exclusiveMaximum" -> setExclusiveMaximum(toBoolean(value));
1239         case "exclusiveMinimum" -> setExclusiveMinimum(toBoolean(value));
1240         case "externalDocs" -> setExternalDocs(toType(value, ExternalDocumentation.class));
1241         case "format" -> setFormat(Utils.s(value));
1242         case "items" -> setItems(toType(value, Items.class));
1243         case "maxItems" -> setMaxItems(toInteger(value));
1244         case "maxLength" -> setMaxLength(toInteger(value));
1245         case "maxProperties" -> setMaxProperties(toInteger(value));
1246         case "maximum" -> setMaximum(toNumber(value));
1247         case "minItems" -> setMinItems(toInteger(value));
1248         case "minLength" -> setMinLength(toInteger(value));
1249         case "minProperties" -> setMinProperties(toInteger(value));
1250         case "minimum" -> setMinimum(toNumber(value));
1251         case "multipleOf" -> setMultipleOf(toNumber(value));
1252         case "not" -> setNot(toType(value, SchemaInfo.class));
1253         case "nullable" -> setNullable(toBoolean(value));
1254         case "oneOf" -> setOneOf(listBuilder(Object.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
1255         case "pattern" -> setPattern(Utils.s(value));
1256         case "properties" -> setProperties(mapBuilder(String.class, SchemaInfo.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
1257         case "readOnly" -> setReadOnly(toBoolean(value));
1258         case "required" -> setRequired(listBuilder(String.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
1259         case "title" -> setTitle(Utils.s(value));
1260         case "type" -> setType(Utils.s(value));
1261         case "uniqueItems" -> setUniqueItems(toBoolean(value));
1262         case "writeOnly" -> setWriteOnly(toBoolean(value));
1263         case "xml" -> setXml(toType(value, Xml.class));
1264         default -> {
1265            super.set(property, value);
1266            yield this;
1267         }
1268      };
1269   }
1270
1271   @Override /* SwaggerElement */
1272   public Set<String> keySet() {
1273      var s = setBuilder(String.class)
1274         .addIf(ref != null, "$ref")
1275         .addIf(additionalProperties != null, "additionalProperties")
1276         .addIf(allOf != null, "allOf")
1277         .addIf(anyOf != null, "anyOf")
1278         .addIf(_default != null, "default")
1279         .addIf(deprecated != null, "deprecated")
1280         .addIf(description != null, "description")
1281         .addIf(discriminator != null, "discriminator")
1282         .addIf(_enum != null, "enum")
1283         .addIf(example != null, "example")
1284         .addIf(exclusiveMaximum != null, "exclusiveMaximum")
1285         .addIf(exclusiveMinimum != null, "exclusiveMinimum")
1286         .addIf(externalDocs != null, "externalDocs")
1287         .addIf(format != null, "format")
1288         .addIf(items != null, "items")
1289         .addIf(maximum != null, "maximum")
1290         .addIf(maxItems != null, "maxItems")
1291         .addIf(maxLength != null, "maxLength")
1292         .addIf(maxProperties != null, "maxProperties")
1293         .addIf(minimum != null, "minimum")
1294         .addIf(minItems != null, "minItems")
1295         .addIf(minLength != null, "minLength")
1296         .addIf(minProperties != null, "minProperties")
1297         .addIf(multipleOf != null, "multipleOf")
1298         .addIf(not != null, "not")
1299         .addIf(nullable != null, "nullable")
1300         .addIf(oneOf != null, "oneOf")
1301         .addIf(pattern != null, "pattern")
1302         .addIf(properties != null, "properties")
1303         .addIf(readOnly != null, "readOnly")
1304         .addIf(required != null, "required")
1305         .addIf(title != null, "title")
1306         .addIf(type != null, "type")
1307         .addIf(uniqueItems != null, "uniqueItems")
1308         .addIf(writeOnly != null, "writeOnly")
1309         .addIf(xml != null, "xml")
1310         .build();
1311      return new MultiSet<>(s, super.keySet());
1312   }
1313
1314   /**
1315    * Resolves any <js>"$ref"</js> attributes in this element.
1316    *
1317    * @param openApi The swagger document containing the definitions.
1318    * @param refStack Keeps track of previously-visited references so that we don't cause recursive loops.
1319    * @param maxDepth
1320    *    The maximum depth to resolve references.
1321    *    <br>After that level is reached, <code>$ref</code> references will be left alone.
1322    *    <br>Useful if you have very complex models and you don't want your swagger page to be overly-complex.
1323    * @return
1324    *    This object with references resolved.
1325    *    <br>May or may not be the same object.
1326    */
1327   public SchemaInfo resolveRefs(OpenApi openApi, Deque<String> refStack, int maxDepth) {
1328
1329      if (ref != null) {
1330         if (refStack.contains(ref) || refStack.size() >= maxDepth)
1331            return this;
1332         refStack.addLast(ref);
1333         var r = openApi.findRef(ref, SchemaInfo.class);
1334         r = r.resolveRefs(openApi, refStack, maxDepth);
1335         refStack.removeLast();
1336         return r;
1337      }
1338
1339      if (items != null)
1340         items = items.resolveRefs(openApi, refStack, maxDepth);
1341
1342      if (properties != null)
1343         for (var e : properties.entrySet())
1344            e.setValue(e.getValue().resolveRefs(openApi, refStack, maxDepth));
1345
1346      if (additionalProperties != null)
1347         additionalProperties = additionalProperties.resolveRefs(openApi, refStack, maxDepth);
1348
1349      this.example = null;
1350
1351      return this;
1352   }
1353
1354   // <FluentSetters>
1355
1356   @Override /* GENERATED - do not modify */
1357   public SchemaInfo strict() {
1358      super.strict();
1359      return this;
1360   }
1361
1362   @Override /* GENERATED - do not modify */
1363   public SchemaInfo strict(Object value) {
1364      super.strict(value);
1365      return this;
1366   }
1367
1368   // </FluentSetters>
1369}
